com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator

Class PropagatorDependencyAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl
      • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.AbstractAdapter
        • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.PropagatorAbstractAdapter
          • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.PropagatorDependencyAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter.Internal

    public abstract class PropagatorDependencyAdapter
extends PropagatorAbstractAdapter
    Listen to changes as mandated by some PropagatorFunctionAdapter(s).

    A PropagatorFunctionAdapter manages the state of a (several) data element(s) and listens to changes of some Notifier. When the state of the managed data elements must be refreshed as a function of changes of some other Notifier, then the PropagatorFunctionAdapter delegates the listening of those changes to a PropagatorDependencyAdapter, that must implement PropagatorAbstractAdapter.notifyChanged(org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notification) and call touch(Object) appropriately.

    The PropagatorDependencyAdapter maintains a collection of PropagatorFunctionAdapters depending on this adapter.

    The PropagatorDependencyAdapter may track the Notifiers touching. In that case, the concrete adapter must override the method isTrackToucher(). When Notifiers -touchers- are tracked, instead of invoking PropagatorFunctionAdapter.calculate(), the framework will call the PropagatorFunctionAdapter.calculate(Object) for every Notifier -toucher - tracked.

    A PropagatorDependencyAdapter is created and added by calling PropagatorAbstractAdapter.addDependency(org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, Object, boolean) on the depending adapter, passing the concrete type of to be created dependency adapter.

    A PropagatorDependencyAdapter is removed by calling PropagatorAbstractAdapter.removeDependency(org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, Object, boolean) on the depending adapter, passing the concrete type of to be removed dependency adapter.

    Author:
    michel
